body:
```
➜  kubernetes git:(master) ✗ cat t
{
  "apiVersion": "v1beta3",
  "kind": "Pod",
  "metadata": {
    "name": "kube-scheduler"
  },
  "spec": {
    "hostNetwork": true,
    "containers": [
      {
        "name": "kube-scheduler",
        "image": "$SCHEDULER_IMAGE",
        "command": [
          "/bin/sh",
          "-c",
          "/usr/local/bin/kube-scheduler --master=127.0.0.1:8080"
        ],
        "livenessProbe": {
          "httpGet": {
            "path": "/healthz",
            "port": 10251
          },
          "initialDelaySeconds": 15,
          "timeoutSeconds": 15
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

```
➜  kubernetes git:(master) ✗ k --v=10 create -f t
F0707 11:52:58.810549  109429 helpers.go:72] error: you must provide one or more resources by argument or filename
```

```
➜  kubernetes git:(master) ✗ curl -k -v -XPOST  -H "User-Agent: kubectl/v0.18.0 (linux/amd64) kubernetes/530bff3" http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/v1beta3/namespaces/default/pods -d @t
* Hostname was NOT found in DNS cache
*   Trying 127.0.0.1...
* Connected to 127.0.0.1 (127.0.0.1) port 8080 (#0)
> POST /api/v1beta3/namespaces/default/pods HTTP/1.1
> Host: 127.0.0.1:8080
> Accept: */*
> User-Agent: kubectl/v0.18.0 (linux/amd64) kubernetes/530bff3
> Content-Length: 557
> Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
> 
* upload completely sent off: 557 out of 557 bytes
< HTTP/1.1 201 Created
< Content-Type: application/json
< Date: Tue, 07 Jul 2015 18:50:50 GMT
< Content-Length: 1009
< 
* Connection #0 to host 127.0.0.1 left intact
{"kind":"Pod","apiVersion":"v1beta3","metadata":{"name":"kube-scheduler","namespace":"default","selfLink":"/api/v1beta3/namespaces/default/pods/kube-scheduler","uid":"16224f98-24d9-11e5-9823-8cdcd43413f0","resourceVersion":"161","creationTimestamp":"2015-07-07T18:50:50Z"},"spec":{"volumes":[{"name":"default-token-hi5ia","secret":{"secretName":"default-token-hi5ia"}}],"containers":[{"name":"kube-scheduler","image":"$SCHEDULER_IMAGE","command":["/bin/sh","-c","/usr/local/bin/kube-scheduler --master=127.0.0.1:8080"],"resources":{},"volumeMounts":[{"name":"default-token-hi5ia","readOnly":true,"mountPath":"/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount"}],"livenessProbe":{"httpGet":{"path":"/healthz","port":10251,"scheme":"HTTP"},"initialDelaySeconds":15,"timeoutSeconds":15},"terminationMessagePath":"/dev/termination-log","imagePullPolicy":"IfNotPresent","capabilities":{}}],"restartPolicy":"Always","dnsPolicy":"ClusterFirst","serviceAccount":"default","hostNetwork":true},"status":{"phase":"Pending"}}
```

title: kubectl create -f with filename is broken
